trans-unit.source: GetXmlNamespace Operator (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: GetXmlNamespace 运算符 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: GetXmlNamespace Operator (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: GetXmlNamespace 运算符 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace> object that corresponds to the specified XML namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>对应于指定的 XML 命名空间前缀的对象。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>

trans-unit.source: Syntax
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Parts
trans-unit.target: 部件

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: 可选。

trans-unit.source: The string that identifies the XML namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 标识 XML 命名空间前缀的字符串。

trans-unit.source: If supplied, this string must be a valid XML identifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，此字符串必须是有效的 XML 标识符。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Names of Declared XML Elements and Attributes](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/names-of-declared-xml-elements-and-attributes.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[名称的声明 XML 元素和属性](../../../visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/xml/names-of-declared-xml-elements-and-attributes.md)。

trans-unit.source: If no prefix is specified, the default namespace is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定前缀，则返回默认命名空间。

trans-unit.source: If no default namespace is specified, the empty namespace is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定没有默认命名空间，则返回空命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Return Value
trans-unit.target: 返回值

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace> object that corresponds to the XML namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>对应于 XML 命名空间前缀的对象。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: 备注

trans-unit.source: The `GetXmlNamespace` operator gets the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace> object that corresponds to the XML namespace prefix `xmlNamespacePrefix`.
trans-unit.target: `GetXmlNamespace`运算符获取<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>对应于 XML 命名空间前缀的对象`xmlNamespacePrefix`。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>

trans-unit.source: You can use XML namespace prefixes directly in XML literals and XML axis properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用直接在 XML 文本和 XML 轴属性中的 XML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: However, you must use the `GetXmlNamespace` operator to convert a namespace prefix to an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace> object before you can use it in your code.
trans-unit.target: 但是，必须使用`GetXmlNamespace`运算符以转换到的命名空间前缀<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>对象，然后可以在代码中使用它。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>

trans-unit.source: You can append an unqualified element name to an <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace> object to get a fully qualified <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName> object, which many [!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)] methods require.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将附加到非限定的元素名称<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>要获取完全限定对象<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName>对象时，哪些多[!INCLUDE[sqltecxlinq](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/sqltecxlinq_md.md)]方法都要求。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XName> </xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNamespace>

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: The following example imports `ns` as an XML namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例导入`ns`作为 XML 命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: It then uses the prefix of the namespace to create an XML literal and access the first child node that has the qualified name `ns:phone`.
trans-unit.target: 它然后使用该命名空间前缀创建 XML 文本和访问具有限定的名的第一个子节点`ns:phone`。

trans-unit.source: It then passes that child node to the `ShowName` subroutine, which constructs a qualified name by using the `GetXmlNamespace` operator.
trans-unit.target: 然后将其传递到，该子节点`ShowName`子例程，它通过构造一个限定的名`GetXmlNamespace`运算符。

trans-unit.source: The `ShowName` subroutine then passes the qualified name to the <xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.Ancestors%2A> method to get the parent `ns:contact` node.
trans-unit.target: `ShowName`子例程然后将传递到的限定的名<xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.Ancestors%2A>方法要获取其父类`ns:contact`节点。</xref:System.Xml.Linq.XNode.Ancestors%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[VbXMLSamples#38](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/codesnippet/VisualBasic/getxmlnamespace-operator_1.vb)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[VbXMLSamples #&38;](../../../visual-basic/language-reference/operators/codesnippet/VisualBasic/getxmlnamespace-operator_1.vb)]
